description: A small rock shaped like an arrowhead.  Its edge is surprisingly sharp.
A teardrop-shaped, fist-sized pool of water, somehow maintaining its form despite the lack of container.  It feels rubbery and cool to the touch, but none of the water gets on your hands.
A glittering gemstone that once formed one of the eyes of a gnome.  You still feel like you're being watched when you look at it.
